mapper.select: select max(id) from ems_task a where to_char(a.createDate,'yyyymmdd')=#{createDate}

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id where a.ecode in (select ecode from ems_taskequipmentlist where task_id=#{task_id})

select a.*,b.code as pole_code from ems_task a,ems_pole b where a.pole_id=b.id and a.type='repair' and a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id} and a.createDate >= to_date(#{date_start},'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.createDate <= to_date(#{date_end},'yyyy-mm-dd')

select a.id,a.memo,a.type,a.status,a.pole_id,b.code as pole_code,a.pole_name,a.pole_address,a.createDate from ems_task a,ems_pole b where a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id} and a.pole_id=b.id and a.type=#{type}
and a.status in ('newTask','read','handling')
and a.status ='submited'
and a.status ='complete'
order by a.createDate desc
order by a.createDate asc
order by b.code desc
order by b.code asc

select a.id,a.memo,a.type,a.status,a.pole_id,b.code as pole_code,a.pole_name,a.pole_address,a.createDate from ems_task a,ems_pole b where a.workunit_id=#{workunit_id} and a.pole_id=b.id and (b.address like #{searchStr} or b.name like #{searchStr} or b.code like #{searchStr}) order by a.createDate desc

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_taskequipmentlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.task_id=#{task_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id
select a.* from EMS_pole a inner join ems_area b on a.area_id=b.id where (a.address like #{pole_name} or a.name like #{pole_name} or a.code like #{pole_name}) and b.workunit_id=#{workunit_id}

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ems_task a,ems_taskequipmentlist b where a.id=b.task_id and ecode=#{ecode} and a.type='repair' and b.type='uninstall' and a.status in('complete','submited') order by a.submitDate desc ) t where t.rn <=1
select count(1) from ems_equipment where status not in (2,3,4) and ecode in (select ecode from ems_taskequipmentlist where task_id=#{task_id})
select ecode from ems_taskequipmentlist where task_id=#{task_id}
